channel.title: Python on Alan Cortez
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Alan Cortez

item.title: AoE - Most Recent Match.
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository. A Python script that uses LibreMatch API to output information about a player’s most recent match in Age Of Empires II DE.

item.title: Inventory Management Website.
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository and the website. This project was developed for the “Codo a Codo - Django” course together with Omar Scarazzato.
